availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Grocer and wholesale flour dealer in Jefferson County, Kentucky. Operated in 1861. Owners: Joseph Brown, Eliza Brown, Thomas G. Brown.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 6, p. 310.
Henry Tanner, ed., The Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1859-60 (Louisville: Maxwell & Co., 1859), 39, 40.
Henry Tanner, ed., The Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1861 (Louisville: Maxwell & Co., 1861), 43-44.
KYR-0001-017-0163.
